greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence with Hankel transform equal to the Somos-4 sequence A006769(n+2).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(x, A(x)) where f(x, y) = (2*x + x^3) * y^2 - (1 + x)^2 * y + 1. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 13 2010
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, polcoeff( 2 / (1 + 2*x + x^2 + sqrt(1 - 4*x + 6*x^2 + x^4 + x*O(x^n))), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 13 2010 */
(MAGMA) m:=40; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); Coefficients(R!(2/(1+2*x+x^2+Sqrt(1-4*x+6*x^2+x^4)))); // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 22 2018
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 19 2010
